remarks: Closure of the additive inverse endomorphism.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Jun-2013.)
statement:
tendoicl.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
tendoicl.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendoicl.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendoicl.i $e |- I = ( s e. E |-> ( f e. T |-> `' ( s ` f ) ) ) $.
tendoicl $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ S e. E ) -> ( I ` S ) e. E ) $.
$d E s $.
$d T f s $.
$d W f s $.
